amendment.description: To require certain dietary supplement manufacturers to report certain serious adverse events.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 3225 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 3225 proposed by Senator Durbin. (consideration: CR S7033-7034; text: CR S7033) To require certain dietary supplement manufacturers to report certain serious adverse events.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3225 proposed by Senator Durbin.
